title: Enjoy exciting community events at Atlas Apartments!
posting_body: Pricing based on lease term of 12 months.
Living among beautiful scenery, striking hillsides that touch the sky, and all the luxuries you can imagine; all within your grasp.
Seize your chance to live in one of the premier apartment communities in Issaquah, WA.
Picture coming home every day to the warm embrace of meticulous landscaping, comfortable homes, and thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.

Located in Issaquah, with easy access to I-90 and junction to I-405, Atlas Apartments is just minutes away from Costco International Headquarters, Microsoft, as well as all of the shopping, dining, and entertainment that the Issaquah Commons and Gilman Village has to offer.

Atlas Apartments provides its residents a wide selection of unique studio, one, or two bedroom apartment homes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like a state-of-the-art fitness center, community gathering space, work pods, BBQ's stations, fire pits and controlled-access buildings.
Come stroll through our pet-friendly community with your favorite furry companion, or have a day out on the town in Gilman Village.
We know you deserve the very best in apartment living, and our community is designed specifically to ensure you don’t just lease, you live.
Take a look at our photo gallery and virtual tour links.
Use the link below for more details:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 912 Sq.
- Designer plumbing fixtures in kitchen and bathrooms
- Resident clubhouse with billiards and lounges
- Shopping center right at your fingertips
